description: Nicol Amalfi is the youngest member of the Le Creuset team; he pilots the GAT-X207 Blitz, which he steals during the raid on Heliopolis. He is mostly calm and good-natured, and becomes friends with Athrun Zala. His thoughts of the war are moderate, and he says in one episode that he joined ZAFT after hearing what happened to Junius Seven, but never really wanted to fight. A gifted musician, his favorite instrument was the piano. While trying to protect Athrun in battle near the Orb Union, Nicol is accidentally killed by Kira Yamato. His seiyu are Mami Matsui for the series and Romi Park in all future appearances.
name: Nicol Amalfi
